Name: Jersey Rose
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP up with cider and add bitters onto foam for aroma.
Review: Cognac laced bittersweet strawberry, pomegranate and cider.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Joe Macbeth at Rub Smokehouse & Bar, Nottingham, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Jersey Rose contains 201 calories
